destiny.assets

Class RippleCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.assets.RippleCursor

  • public class RippleCursor
extends Object
    A class that handles all the functionality of a ripple that will follow the user's cursor around
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearTrail()
      Clears the trail following the ripple cursor
      static RippleCursor createHighPerformanceCursor()
      Creates a RippleCursor object with a larger amount of time between ripples
      static RippleCursor createLowPerformanceCursor()
      Creates a RippleCursor object with a smaller amount of time between ripples
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet window)
      Draws the ripple cursor and its trail to the screen

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createLowPerformanceCursor

        public static RippleCursor createLowPerformanceCursor()
        Creates a RippleCursor object with a smaller amount of time between ripples
        Returns:
        The RippleCursor object. It will have much more ripples than a high performance cursor

      • createHighPerformanceCursor

        public static RippleCursor createHighPerformanceCursor()
        Creates a RippleCursor object with a larger amount of time between ripples
        Returns:
        The RippleCursor object. It will have much less ripples than a low performance cursor

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet window)
        Draws the ripple cursor and its trail to the screen
        Parameters:
        window - The PApplet that should have the cursor drawn to it
        Postcondition:
        The given PApplet will have the cursor drawn to it

      • clearTrail

        public void clearTrail()
        Clears the trail following the ripple cursor
